title.rendered: Mission Control Launches Laurelle App on iOS and Android 🚀

content.rendered:
Mission Control is very excited to announce the launch of the new Laurelle Antique Jewellery Mobile App experience – developed natively for both Apple iOS and Google Android devices.

Laurelle is one of the UK’s largest and most recognised dealers of antique jewellery and the new multi-platform Mobile App sets the standard for fine jewellery discovery and shopping with extensive integration into the Shopify backend platform used to manage the Web and database systems, alongside fast and native animations and layouts using an easy and robust centralised codebase.

And this is just the beginning.

With the launch of Version 1.0, Mission Control has already begun work on the next phase of the App with several new features including saved Wishlists, personal Collections, and advanced Push Notifications.

Jump on over to the Apple App Store or Google Play Store now and check out the new Mobile destination for luxury antique jewellery:
